short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes all tabs and opens Google Classroom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This sophisticated chrome extension allows you to close your tab and open google classroom without anyone ever seeing you off of google classroom. This allows you to discreetly switch out with the red button.
